title: Nothing to Lose (1997) (Tim Robbins, Martin Lawrence)

  Tim Robbins plays an addled advertising executive who comes home early one day and discovers his wife in bed with his boss. To make matters worse, he&#039;s later carjacked by a struggling, unemployed family-man-turned-petty-thief (Martin Lawrence), and that&#039;s when he loses his cool completely. He takes the carjacker hostage and recruits him on a road-trip scheme of revenge against his wife and boss. Plotting to break into his boss&#039;s high-security vault, Robbins gets a criminal assist from Lawrence, but they&#039;re also on the run from another pair of would-be thieves who trail them to the vault&#039;s location.

  Starring: Tim Robbins, Martin Lawrence, John C. McGinley, Giancarlo Esposito, Kelly Preston, Michael McKean, Rebecca Gayheart.

  Directed by: Steve Oedekerk.
